meanings.definition: A spoken or written representation or account of a person, object, or event.
meanings.sent1: The teacher gave a detailed description of the painting to the class.
meanings.sent2: Please provide a brief description of your favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The description of the alien's appearance in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her description of the sunset painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The description of the haunted house was so scary that I couldn't sleep.

meanings.definition: The act or process of describing something in words.
meanings.sent1: His description of the crime scene helped the police solve the case.
meanings.sent2: The author's vivid description of the forest transported me to another world.
meanings.sent3: The description of the messy room made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her poetic description of love as a battlefield resonated with me.
meanings.sent5: The description of the storm was so realistic that I could almost feel the rain.
